data.name: Maze Exit
data.description:
Description:

This is a question about finding the exit from a maze. 'gameMap' (the maze) and the starting point will be given. Your job is to write the function to find the exit.

GameMap:

We have THREE levels and each level will be a 3x3 maze. In the maze,
`'O'` means the path you must follow.
`'X'` means a place you cannot enter. The starting point will be given as an array `[x,y]`, for example `[0,1]` if the start is at position (0,1) (The first row with second column)

Example:

`[0,1]` is the starting point and below the mazes are given.

gameMap1

player starts from [0,1] to [2,1], we got [2,1] to next level `[['X','O','X'],` `['X','O','X'],` `['X','O','X']]`

gameMap2

player start from [2,1] to [0,2], we got [0,2] to next level `[['X','X','O'],` `['X','X','O'],` `['X','O','O']]`

gameMap3

player start from [0,2] to [1,0], we got [1,0] as the final exit `[['X','O','O'],` `['O','O','X'],` `['X','X','X']]`
